title: One Twin Too Many
description: My Pokey ValentineOh no! Mary-Kate and Ashley have to do history projects. But Ashley's found a way to make her project fun--she's partners with Pokey Valentine, the boy of her dreams! It's the perfect way to get close to him.The only problem is, Pokey would rather get close to someone else...someone named Mary-Kate!
author: Megan Stine
